participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, always looking for new experiences.
participant_1.background: i walk dogs for a living. i'm also a graduate student. i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills.

participant_2.background: i am 60 years old. i think i'll retire in a few years. i'm a librarian. i've visited spain a few times. i really like to travel.
